title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedder.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, and embedding helpers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that adds prompts library, history, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) plus docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop client for Ollama (Windows/macOS/Linux).

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels or threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into channels with DM support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for Ollama.
